item.mowziesmobs.foliaath_seed.text.0:
ยง2Plant in grass. Every 12 hours, feed the baby Biteleaf meat.
ยง2In 2 days, it will fully grow into a Biteleaf.
item.mowziesmobs.foliaath_seed.text.1:
The Biteleaf is a native life form
that has evolved to consume anything in its path.
Resembling a carnivorous plant, this predatory flora
remains hidden underground until it senses something edible nearby.
item.mowziesmobs.foliaath_seed.text.2:
When potential prey approaches, the Biteleaf swiftly emerges,
using its powerful jaw to bite and devour its victim.
Its vibrant, almost hypnotic coloration helps to distract and disorient its prey,
while its sudden appearance leaves little time for escape.
item.mowziesmobs.foliaath_seed.text.3:
Legends tell of ancient forests where the Biteleaf thrived,
turning lush landscapes into perilous hunting grounds.
Nowadays, they can only be found in jungles, their natural environment.
